title: AppSync to SQS
description: Create an AppSync API with an SQS HTTP data source

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This CDK application deploys an AppSync API which uses an SQS HTTP datasource. AWS AppSync provides a 'sendMessage' query that sends a message to the configured SQS queue. The query returns the response MessageId, and the MD5OfMessageBody of the response.
See the GitHub repo for detailed instructions
